createLotteryPot(string,uint256,uint256,.details: The new LotteryPot contract is then saved in the array of this contract for future reference.

params.duration: - The duration of the pot `open` period
params.minStake: - The minimum stake required to join the lottery pot
params.potType: - refer to the LotteryPot contract for explaination

destroy().details: Only honor request from this contract owner, aka, the platform admin.

disableLotteryPot(address).details: Only honor request from this contract owner, aka, the platform admin.

returns._0: An array of all created LotteryPot contracts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

toggleEnabled().details: Only honor request from this contract owner, aka, the platform admin.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
